actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary (no written rept.).
Measure indefinitely postponed in Senate, H.R. 8152 passed in lieu.

official_title: An original bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968.

summary.text: Extends the programs provided for in the title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act to fiscal year 1974. Authorizes to be appropriated $1,000,000,000 for fiscal year 1974 for programs under such Act. States that funds appropriated shall remain available for obligation until expended. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 3760, 3768)

titles.title: An original bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968.
